I think the reason some people hate NTR is because of the idiotic cliches plot device it has to use to start it's own story, which is why most characters have bricks for brains, and more time is given to the art then character development as well as the fact that NTR is the easiest genre to do to get a quick buck. I'm not going to say NTR sucks and VANILLA rules cause that is stupid but I am going to say laziness sucks and effort rules.
